help.qrOnlyWithCoolMaze: This QR-code works only with the mobile app Cool Maze!
help.intro: You can share a document from your mobile device to a computer or video projector

help.thatsIt: That's it. No login, no passwords, no ads.
help.needInternet: The two devices, source and target, must have internet connection.

privacy.text: Your data remains private. It is not publicly available and not disclosed to third parties. See the

help.timeout: The resource is available only for a few minutes after transfer, so you may want to explicitly save it on your computer.

hotmaze.text: But I want to send from computer to mobile instead! Then use

e2ee.tooltip: Data sent with Cool Maze is encrypted in such a way that the Cool Maze service provider can't read it.
